      public it.unimi.dsi.fastutil.ints.IntList updateAdd​(int idx1, int idx2, double val)
      Description copied from interface: UpdateableSimilarity
      Updates the similarities between user/items after adding/modifying a rating.
      Parameters:
      idx1 - index of user
      idx2 - index of item
      val - rating value
      Returns:
